sect2.title: Installation de unzip
sect2.para: Installez unzip en lançant les commandes suivantes:

screen.userinput: patch -Np1 -i ../unzip-5.50-fix-Makefile.patch && patch -Np1 -i ../unzip-5.50-fix-libz.patch && cp unix/Makefile . && make prefix=/usr linux && make prefix=/usr linux_shlibz && make prefix=/usr install && cp -a libunzip.so* /usr/lib
